pos_mean_info_list.mean: 保证；约定；同…订婚（engage的过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 可与hire换用，特指雇用专业人员。
正式用词，侧重受雇者虽为薪金而工作，但工作固定共享有相当尊严。
普通用词，常指短期或长期雇用某人从事某一特定工作或一次性的工作，含强调为薪金而工作的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 建立友好关系；接触；交战
从事...；投身于...；和某人订婚

bilingual.source: The workers engage in labour to build the new bridge.
bilingual.target: 工人们从事劳动来建造新桥。

bilingual.source: He decided to engage in public affairs to serve society.
bilingual.target: 他决定从事公务，为社会服务。

bilingual.source: In an agricultural society, people mainly engage in farming and breeding.
bilingual.target: 在农业社会中，人们主要从事种植和养殖。

bilingual.source: During the summer, many researchers engage in fieldwork to gather samples.
bilingual.target: 夏季，许多研究人员从事实地工作以收集样本。

bilingual.source: To carry on, engage in, or practice.
B etter master one than engage with ten.
bilingual.target: 精通一门胜于从事十门。

bilingual.source: Vt. To engage or use the services of.

yingyinNormal.en: Your Majesty, I urge you to engage the Guardian with all haste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国王陛下，恳请您即刻召唤守护者来保护大家。

yingyinNormal.en: If you do not wish to engage in honorable terms, we will return to…
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你无意商谈条款的话我们就回…

yingyinNormal.en: When they get on target, and they will get on target, wait to engage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当她们锁定目标，她们一定会锁定等待发动进攻。

yingyinNormal.en: Come back to the table. Engage us in good faith. Or the resolution goes to a vote next week.
yingyinNormal.zh: 重新回到谈判桌上来，与我们真诚谈判，否则下周提案就将进入表决环节。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the first way, okay? Just not engage in that. That did not work out very well for your mother and me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是第一种方法，好不？不要发生关系，像我和你妈这方面做得就不好。

yingyinNormal.en: In the classroom paradigm, the teacher has the responsibility to communicate, as well as entertain and engage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在教室这一范例中，教师有交流的责任，也有娱乐和吸引学生的责任。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a risk I'm willing to take. All right, then. Let's go to the bedroom, remove our clothes, fold them neatly and engage in frenzied lovemaking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我愿意冒这个险。那好吧。我们进卧室，除去衣衫，叠得整整齐齐再开始狂野性爱。

yingyinNormal.en: If the two of you then engage in intercourse, this will create the biochemical reaction in the brain which lay people naively interpret as "falling in love."
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后如果你们俩交往的话，它会在大脑促生生物化学反应，让人们想当然地以为自己陷入爱河。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if the Chinese are not willing to engage in a meaningful dialogue about intellectual property of American corporations, as well as this deliberate targeting of our government's online infrastructure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果中方没有诚意进行一场有意义的对话，探讨美国公司的知识产权，以及对我政府网络设施的蓄意攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes. According to the Relationship Agreement, on the anniversary of our first date, he must take me to a nice dinner, ask about my day and engage in casual physical contact that a disinterested onlooker might mistake for intimacy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然有，根据恋爱协议，我们的首次约会周年纪念日，他得带我去吃顿好的，关心我那天的生活琐事，然后对我做出一些肢体接触，是让旁观者都觉得我们很亲密的那种哦。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 建立友好关系；接触；交战

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 订婚；婚约；约会；预约；约定；保证；交战；战斗；婚约期

word_family.mean: v. 引起；吸引；参加；从事；卷入；聘请；允诺；约定；使某人加入；雇用

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>engages</highlight> in anti-competitive practices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它从事反竞争行为。

examination_example.sentence: Rats have been shown to <highlight>engage</highlight> in multiple forms of reciprocal help and cooperation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，老鼠会进行多种多样形式的互助及合作。

examination_example.sentence: Do your best to <highlight>engage</highlight> coworkers in a genuine, back-and-forth conversation, rather than prioritizing your own thoughts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽可能与同事进行一次有来有往的真诚交流，而不是优先考虑你自己的想法。

sense_info_list.en: become involved with and try to understand something or someone

examination_example.sentence: Different readers produce different but overlapping readings of the same words on the page — including for texts that <highlight>engage</highlight> with fundamental human concerns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同的读者对同一页上的文字产生了不同但又重合的解读——包括那些涉及人类基本问题的文章。

sense_info_list.en: occupy, attract, or involve one's attention and interest
arrange to employ or hire some

word_usage.usage: 表达“（使）从事，参加” 可以说sb.engage in sth.也可以说engage sb in sth.
engage in/on/upon指做某事或参与某项活动；join指加入组织、团体等，也指与他人一同做某事；take part in指参加集体性的活动；participate in多指积极、主动参与某事; attend多指出席会议、参加学术活动、听课等。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 与...建立密切关系; 尽力理解
吸引关注; 引起注意

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 订婚；婚约；约会；预约；约定；保证；交战；战斗；婚约期

word_family.mean: v. 引起；吸引；参加；从事；卷入；聘请；允诺；约定；使某人加入；雇用

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 建立友好关系；接触；交战

examination_example.sentence: They are forever <highlight>engaged</highlight> in hunting for new information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们总是忙于寻找新的信息。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers have already begun to use smart phones in social scientific research to query people regularly as they <highlight>engage</highlight> in their normal lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员已经开始在社会科学研究中使用智能手机，以定期查询人们的正常生活。

examination_example.sentence: The robot itself doesn't have to <highlight>engage</highlight> directly—it can serve as an intermediary for human communication.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人本身并不一定要直接参与，它可以作为人类交流的中介。

sense_info_list.en: become involved with and try to understand something or someone
sense_info_list.zh: 与...建立密切关系; 尽力理解

examination_example.sentence: Both individuals and businesses post regularly to <highlight>engage</highlight> and interact with people from around the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人和企业都定期发布帖子，与来自世界各地的人进行互动。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Engaging</highlight> with clients, getting recommendations, staying in contact with clients afterwards, these are things you'll find will provide you with motivation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与客户接触，获得推荐，（合作）之后与客户保持联系，这些都会给你提供动力。

sense_info_list.en: occupy, attract, or involve one's interest or
sense_info_list.zh: 吸引关注; 引起注意

examination_example.sentence: Instead of a quest for knowledge, it <highlight>engages</highlight> us in an endless zest for instant approval from an audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不是对知识的追求，而是让我们对观众的即时认可产生无尽的热情。

examination_example.sentence: In theory, interactive advertising can <highlight>engage</highlight> viewers in a way that 30-second spots do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 理论上，互动广告可以以一种30秒广告所不能的方式吸引观众。

sense_info_list.en: arrange to employ or hire some

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 正式用词, 侧重受雇者虽为薪金而工作, 但工作固定共享有相当尊严。
可与 hire 换用, 特指雇用专业人员。
普通用词, 常指短期或长期雇用某人从事某一特定工作或一次性的工作, 含强调为薪金而工作的意味。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 与...建立密切关系; 尽力理解
吸引关注; 引起注意

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 订婚；婚约；约会；预约；约定；保证；交战；战斗；婚约期

word_family.mean: v. 引起；吸引；参加；从事；卷入；聘请；允诺；约定；使某人加入；雇用

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Engage</highlight> in real-life interactions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参与现实生活中的互动。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Engage</highlight> students with challenging tasks to foster their creativity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让学生参与具有挑战性的任务，培养他们的创造力。

examination_example.sentence: Taking whatever materials are handy and tinkering with them is a simple way to <highlight>engage</highlight> those important "maker" skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用任何方便的材料并对其进行修补是培养那些重要的“创客”技能的简单方法。

sense_info_list.en: become involved with and try to understand something or someone
sense_info_list.zh: 与...建立密切关系; 尽力理解

examination_example.sentence: Many scholars have insisted that time online does not necessarily take away time spent <highlight>engaging</highlight> with traditional media or on other activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多学者坚持认为，上网时间并不一定会占用花在传统媒体或其他活动上的时间。

examination_example.sentence: The military training is an opportunity for freshmen to socialize with each other while further <highlight>engaging</highlight> with campus faculty and staff.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 军训为新生提供了一个相互交往的机会，同时也能进一步与校园教职员工进行交流。

examination_example.sentence: Rather than having real-life conversations, many express emotions and <highlight>engage</highlight> in deep conversations through social media sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人不进行现实生活中的对话，而是通过社交媒体网站表达情感，进行深入的对话。

sense_info_list.en: occupy; attract; or involve one's interest or
sense_info_list.zh: 吸引关注; 引起注意

examination_example.sentence: Like cats, babies appear to <highlight>engage</highlight> in what's called "preferential looking"— looking longer at things that are interesting or unusual than things they perceive as normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和猫一样，婴儿似乎也会进行所谓的“优先寻找”，即比起它们认为正常的事物，它们看有趣或不寻常的事物的时间更长。

sense_info_list.en: arrange to employ or hire some

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>engage</highlight> college undergraduates to teach computer science to high school students, who in turn instruct middle school students on the topic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们请大学本科生教授高中生计算机科学，然后再由高中生去指导初中生。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 正式用词，侧重受雇者虽为薪金而工作，但工作固定共享有相当尊严。
可与 hire 换用，特指雇用专业人员。
普通用词，常指短期或长期雇用某人从事某一特定工作或一次性的工作，含强调为薪金而工作的意味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 订婚；婚约；约会；预约；约定；保证；交战；战斗；婚约期

word_family.mean: v. 引起；吸引；参加；从事；卷入；聘请；允诺；约定；使某人加入；雇用

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>engage</highlight> in an argument respectfully without stirring up (激起) anger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以礼貌地进行争论，而不会激起愤怒。

examination_example.sentence: Policymakers and the rest of us must <highlight>engage</highlight> openly with the risk of global collapse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政策制定者和我们其他人必须公开应对全球崩溃的风险。

examination_example.sentence: Those who were highest in status in high school are "most likely to <highlight>engage</highlight> (从事) in dangerous and risky behavior."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些在高中时地位最高的人才“最有可能从事危险和冒险的行为”。
